name: GoldenBasis
headline: Modern back-office software for brokerages
description: GoldenBasis makes modern back-office software for brokerages like Schwab or Fidelity, and we’re starting with asset transfers. Every year, $1.1 trillion in assets are transferred between brokerages using decades-old software. Brokerages hire thousands of people to compensate but still lose revenue from abandoned transfers. We solve this problem by automating back-office workflows with AI.
tags: industry:fintech; industry:api; industry:enterprise-software; industry:infrastructure; industry:operations; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Grant Ackerman, Founder
founders.description: Grant is the co-founder & CEO of GoldenBasis. Grant previously led Altruist's integration of SSG, which Altruist acquired to become the third-largest custodian by number of RIAs behind Schwab and Fidelity. Before that, Grant helped grow Princeton’s endowment from $26.1 billion to $37.7 billion as a member of the 20-person investment staff. Grant graduated from Princeton, where he studied Economics, Computer Science, and Finance and met Andrew.

founders.name: Andrew Wang, Founder
founders.description: Andrew is the co-founder & CTO of GoldenBasis. Before GoldenBasis, Andrew did quant research and software engineering at Citadel, where he built trading systems that process billions of dollars per day. Before that, he worked at Bridgewater, where he wrote software to model global economies and trade fixed income securities. Andrew graduated from Princeton, where he majored in Operations Research & Financial Engineering (ORFE) and met Grant.

For DTCC members
# Customer account transfers reimagined
# Automate your transfer process, free up your ops team, and make it easier for clients to bring in assets.
[Talk to the founders](https://www.goldenbasis.com/<#schedule-intro>)

ACAT receives & delivers

Non-ACAT (manual) transfers

Mutual fund transfers

CBRS send/receive cost basis
Proud member of
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/6669d5bf831724093b2540fe_SifmaLogoBWNoBackground.png)](https://www.goldenbasis.com/<https:/sources.sifma.org/listing/goldenbasis>)
![Pause video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628299f8aa233b83918e24fd_Pause.svg)![Play video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628298b20ae0236682d4b87f_Play-24.svg)
Meet your new transfer command center
For the small number of transfers that GoldenBasis doesn't fully automate, empower your ops team to easily handle exceptions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/66d5f6cc1f1693479364baef_image%20\(4\).png)
**TASK QUEUES**![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/666bafdc999cf380d2cf710e_GBPortalQueues.png)
**ROLES AND PERMISSIONS**![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/666baef8033967a4f5467f5f_GBPortalRoles.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/666bb16d999cf380d2d09100_GBPortalRolesMobile.png)
**INTEGRATIONS**![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/666baa1b29d8dd85b9d03b5e_GBPortalIntegrations.png)
**DETAILED HISTORY**![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/666ba9279a232c2b82558b52_GBPortalHistory.png)
Surprisingly easy to integrate
Our expert team becomes an extension of yours, working side-by-side to ensure a seamless integration.
Step 1
**We connect to your DTCC account**
You provision us with limited access to your DTCC clearing number, including ACATS and CBRS. This allows us to securely process transfers on your behalf.
Step 2
**We integrate with your books & records**
Our team works closely with yours to plug in GoldenBasis to your existing books and records system, whether it's homegrown or a third party provider.
Step 3
**We complete our thorough test plan**
We methodically work our way up from initiating our first transfer in your DTCC PSE (test) environment to handling your account transfers in production, rigorously testing at each step to ensure exceptional performance.
Step 4
**We go live with confidence**
As you gain confidence in the system, we'll fully automate more and more of your live transfers to enhance client experience, reduce operational cost, and mitigate regulatory risk.
Modern API for complete customization
While our functionality out of the box is already strong, we allow you to build anything you want on top of GoldenBasis with our APIs and webhooks.
[Talk to the founders](https://www.goldenbasis.com/<#schedule-intro>)
**TRANSFER TYPES SUPPORTED**

Full transfer (FUL)

Partial transfer (PTR and PTD)

Fail reversal (FRV)

Residual credit (RCR)

Reclaim (RCL)

Position transfer fund (PTF)

Mutual fund cleanup (MFC)
**ASSET CLASSES SUPPORTED**

Equities and ETFs

Fixed income

Mutual funds

Options

Alternative investments

Unit investment trusts

Annuities
**OTHER API HIGHLIGHTS**

AI-powered data validation

Bulk transfer support

Robust error handling

Comprehensive documentation

Enterprise-grade security

Sandbox environment

Dedicated support team
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/666b193f77396699257ecead_GBAPIExample3.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/666b1edcbc5c8c42223c554d_GBAPIMobileExample2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/666b20a1718b6c8c7f403d4f_GBAPIMobileExample1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/666b1edc7f160946fe558dc4_GBAPIMobileExample3.png)
Redefine client onboarding
Leverage GB's APIs and SDKs to transform client onboarding, making it simpler than ever for end clients to add assets.
Powered by GB
# Simplify transfer forms for clients
# With GoldenBasis, new clients can simply upload an account statement from their current brokerage. Our AI extracts and validates the fields, significantly reducing errors and confusion.
![Pause video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628299f8aa233b83918e24fd_Pause.svg)![Play video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628298b20ae0236682d4b87f_Play-24.svg)
![Pause video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628299f8aa233b83918e24fd_Pause.svg)![Play video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628298b20ae0236682d4b87f_Play-24.svg)
Powered by GB
# Empower clients with real-time transfer tracking
# With GoldenBasis, you can easily implement real-time status tracking for your end clients. This transparency keeps them informed and reduces support inquiries, enhancing their overall experience.
Our team comes from top financial, tech, and academic institutions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/65b871f8c8f8ac620994e917_CitadelLogoBlackWhite.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/65b9a5de1cc175090934e433_BridgewaterLogoBlackWhite.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/65b871f74b761f48c065c0ed_CantorFitzgeraldBlackWhite.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/65b871f738986d565fca4b85_JPMorganLogoBlackWhite.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/65b871f78bdd7fd33d8d655a_AltruistLogoBlackWhite.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/65b871f8fce037ef4268f1d8_SpaceXLogoBlackWhite.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/6669c5830e70d5ea659c3abd_StanfordLogoBlackWhite.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/6669c5775eec600a7f6b230a_PrincetonLogoBlackWhite.png)
We're well funded and supported by top tier investors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/66300c4b32c66441e832c9dc_GeneralCatalystLogoNoBackgroundGrey.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/66301baa42a5227d8aef0471_SomaLogoNoBackgroundGrey.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/66300bc245ac97365b0e9274_GopherLogoNoBackgroundGrey.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/66301ce4fa85354c8b414e0b_YCLogoNoBackgroundGrey.png)
FAQ
#### **Who is GoldenBasis for?**

GoldenBasis is made for DTCC members who want to automate their customer account transfers, including ACATS and non-ACATS (manual transfers). We can add the most value to the following types of DTCC members:- Self-clearing broker-dealers- Correspondent clearing firms- Private banks- Wirehouses or large wealth management firms- Trust companies- Insurance companies that sell annuities- Mutual fund transfer agentsIf you're an introducing broker dealer or RIA with over $1 billion in assets, and you're unhappy with how your custodian processes customer account transfers, please schedule time with us below, and we may be able to help.
#### **What exactly does GoldenBasis do?**

GoldenBasis is a new way for DTCC members to automate and manage customer account transfers (ACATS and non-ACATS) from start to finish. We offer 3 main components:1. A Transfer Command Center for your ops team to handle exceptions that can embed within your existing ops platform and maximize straight through processing. It can provide tailored views for both the DTCC member as well as any correspondents. The Transfer Command Center enables you to monitor all customer account transfers, take action on transfers, and view the complete history of actions taken by operations staff and the system.2. A powerful set of APIs that allow GoldenBasis to connect with the DTCC and all of your existing back-office systems for complete customization.3. Pilot programs, custom development, and consulting to ensure meaningful ROI with downside protection.
#### **Can GoldenBasis help us implement ACATS transfers if we're not currently using them?**

Absolutely! If you're a bank or trust company with a DTC clearing number but don't yet use ACATS transfers, we can guide you through the process of enabling them at DTCC. Implementing ACATS transfers offer significant benefits, including enhanced client experience through streamlined account transfers, increased ability to attract and retain assets on your platform, and improved operational efficiency by eliminating manual processing.
#### **How long does it take to integrate GoldenBasis?**

Integration times can vary depending on the complexity of your existing systems and the specific requirements of your firm. However, we aim to ensure a smooth and efficient implementation process, typically ranging from a few weeks to a few months. Please reach out to discuss your specific situation.
#### **How customizable is GoldenBasis?**

GoldenBasis is highly customizable to meet the unique needs of each DTCC member. We understand that DTCC members have their own specific rules and policies regarding customer account transfers such as with margin requirements. We also allow firms to customize their level of automation.For correspondent clearing firms, we can allow your correspondents to set their own firm-specific rules within the system.
**Ready to reimagine your account transfers?**
Schedule an intro with our Co-founder & CEO to see if there's a good fit
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b738e900497f3ac62c90f8/65cd6192ffa57e62704eb5f1_GoldenBasisLogo%20\(6\).svg)](https://www.goldenbasis.com/</>)
Streamlined customer account transfers

generated_description:
**GoldenBasis: Streamlining Back-Office Operations for Brokerages**

Founded in 2024 and based in San Francisco, GoldenBasis is a fintech startup on a mission to revolutionize the back-office software landscape for brokerages. Part of Y Combinator's Winter 2024 batch, this two-person team is addressing a significant pain point in the financial industry: how to manage the staggering $1.1 trillion in assets transferred annually between brokerages. Despite the size of this market, the tools used are often outdated, leading to inefficiencies and lost revenue from abandoned transfers. 

GoldenBasis is tackling this head-on by automating the complexities of back-office workflows with artificial intelligence. Their primary focus is on asset transfers, including both ACATs (Automated Customer Account Transfers) and non-ACATs, which often require manual intervention. Their solution allows brokerages to free up operations teams, streamline processes, and ultimately improve the client onboarding experience.

**Core Features:**
- **Transfer Command Center:** This feature empowers operations teams to monitor and manage transfers effectively, handling exceptions seamlessly while maximizing automation.
- **Robust API Integration:** GoldenBasis offers a powerful set of APIs that link directly with brokerage systems, enabling customized solutions for unique operational requirements.
- **AI-Powered Data Validation:** By leveraging AI, GoldenBasis improves the accuracy of data entry during the transfer process, significantly reducing errors and confusion for both clients and operations staff.

**Why They Matter:**
GoldenBasis stands out in the crowded fintech space by not only modernizing back-office operations but also enhancing client experiences through real-time transfer tracking and simplified onboarding processes. Their approach is particularly beneficial for self-clearing broker-dealers, wealth management firms, and related entities looking to improve operational efficiency and client satisfaction.

**Funding and Support:**
Backed by leading investors and boasting a team with expertise from top financial and tech institutions, GoldenBasis is both well-funded and well-positioned to make a substantial impact.

In short, GoldenBasis is focused on transforming the outdated paradigms of brokerage operations into a more efficient, automated future, ramp-ready for the demands of modern finance. For brokerages eager to enhance their operations and client experiences, connecting with the GoldenBasis team might just be the next smart move. You can learn more on their [website](https://www.goldenbasis.com).
